channel.title: Projects on Siddharth C
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Siddharth C

item.title: My Journey into learning Direct3D 11
item.description: Rendering Triangles through rasterization: Knowledge about the rendering pipeline process where triangles are converted into pixels on the screen by the graphics processing unit (GPU) through a technique called rasterization. Model loading with normals: How to load 3D models into the graphics memory of the GPU and incorporate normal vectors for lighting calculations. Texture Mapping: I gained experience with texture mapping, where images are applied to 3D models to enhance their realism.
